algorithm_technique: Dynamic programming or BFS on states representing (current_value, num_operators).
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum operators to express a target number using a base number x.
problem_summary_technical: Use DP/BFS to find the shortest path to target value using x and {+, -, *, /} operators.
key_insights: This problem can be framed as a shortest path problem on a graph where nodes are numbers and edges are operations.
A greedy approach based on powers of x and remainders can be efficient.
The provided solution uses a clever DP-like approach by processing digits of target in base x.
